messages.title: OUR NHS... AT RISK!
messages.content: Quotes highlighting concerns about NHS privatisation and funding issues under the Conservative government.

messages.title: Isn't it time you had an MP who fights for you?
messages.content: Promotes the candidate as someone who will actively fight for the constituents' interests.

messages.title: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
messages.content: Nick Clegg's proposed tax changes that would ensure no tax on the first £10,000, saving most people £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg's plan to not tax the first £10,000, saving most people £700 and no tax on £10 for every child.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Chance For Every Child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A plan to fund smaller classes for schools and a fair start for children.
Creating jobs by making Britain greener and promoting renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Deal From The Politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A proposal for a recall system and giving the British people a say over MPs' expenses.

issues.economy: Fair taxes that put money back in your pocket; A fair start for every child.
issues.education: A fair start for every child.
issues.environment: A fair future: creating jobs by making Britain greener.
issues.governance: A fair deal from the politicians.
issues.health: Quotes highlighting concerns about NHS privatisation and funding issues under the Conservative government.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a form for tactical voting support indicating a tactical situation in the constituency.
